originalText.text: I could not be happier with Zac and his team.  After living here 30 years, I needed to make some changes to make my place safer for me.  It was a small job, but Zac was up for it.  He was extremely supportive of me with my concept.  The construction was done last week and looks better than I imagined.  It is being painted.  It is adding architectural interest that really freshens up my home.

originalText.text: Could not recommend Zac LESS. So unprofessional, unhelpful, and work was worse than when we started. We hired Zac to transform a bookshelf into a laundry closet. All seemed to be going well at the beginning but through the process we learned that Zac had hired an independent contractor. This contractor seemed to know a lot of information, however, his finished project was not what was promised. Constant delays / disingenuous promised timing due to arriving late every day, very sloppy, little attention to details (see photos below)! We had so many issues we had to get a new contractor to solve them… the floors that were put in were not anchored so they moved a ton, none of our shelves fit flush with where they were supposed to (which was blamed on our apartment structure), and our new contractor told us the materials that were used were cheap (the wood was painted and it kept scratching off). When we would contact Zac for guidance he was not helpful at all and claimed he’s not responsible after having us make final payment directly to the independent contractor.

originalText.text: I had an excellent experience with Renovationyc, the home contractor who painted my apartment and handled other tasks, such as installing a new toilet and bathroom light. The quality of their work was exceptional. The paint job was flawless, and they paid great attention to detail, leaving no room for any complaints. Moreover, they efficiently and skillfully installed the new toilet and bathroom light, making sure everything was in perfect working order. Throughout the process, they were professional, courteous, and always willing to address any questions or concerns I had. I highly recommend this contractor to anyone in need of reliable home improvement services. They truly exceeded my expectations, and I couldn't be happier with the final results!

originalText.text: We couldn’t be happier with the carpentry work by Renovation NYC.  We found Zac to be very honest and reliable.  We hired Renovation NYC to replace and build a fireplace mantel, floating shelves, and hallway closet in an 1894 Brownstone.  The quality of the carpentry was better than I had expected.  They took the time to fit the mantel and cabinet in place to look very professional.  We would recommend Renovation NYC for their carpentry and would hire again when we have additional carpentry needs.

originalText.text: Zac and his team did excellent work for me, fabricating bookshelves and a desk.  They were reliably on time, returned texts and emails promptly, worked cleanly and respectfully.  The work is lovely, exactly what I wanted.
